# timeInterval

**Instance Property**

The time interval that represents the date range.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var timeInterval: TimeInterval { get set }
```

## Discussion

The date range begins at the date in the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDatePickerCell/dateValue] property. The value in this property applies only when the date picker is in the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSRangeDateMode] mode.

## Object Values

- **dateValue**: The date currently specified in the picker.
- **calendar**: The calendar used by the date picker.
- **locale**: The locale used to display dates.
- **timeZone**: The time zone used to display time-related values.
